dialogs.buttonText: Why can't I buy fish here?
dialogs.responseText: I mainly sell directly to an export company that offers me great prices for excluvisity, sorry.

dialogs.buttonText: What can I do with fish?
dialogs.responseText: The most popular thing is making sushi. Just roll some rice in some seaweed, and you can add a cut of fish on top. It's delicious and healthy, but there is a bit of a learning curve.

dialogs.buttonText: Can I sell you my fish?
dialogs.responseText: I won't buy any more fish today, maybe try a different time.
